subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Preakness Stakes
Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Among the Kentucky Derby entrants, only Gary Stute, the trainer of the fourth-place finisher, Papa Clem, said for certain he was heading for the Preakness Stakes, the second leg of the Triple Crown.
snippet: Among the Kentucky Derby entrants, only Gary Stute, the trainer of the fourth-place finisher, Papa Clem, said for certain he was heading for the Preakness Stakes, the second leg of the Triple Crown.
